channel.title: Article on OSPO++
channel.description: Recent content in Article on OSPO++

item.title: Commercial Open Source Software
item.description: Open source software (OSS) is often available at no cost. However, in recent years, we have seen a significant number of high-growth companies emerge with business models that incorporate OSS.

item.title: Open Science, Technology Transfer & Innovation
item.description: Defining ‘Open Science’ UNESCO states open science is: “… An inclusive construct that combines various movements and practices aiming to make multilingual scientific knowledge openly available, accessible and reusable for everyone.

item.title: The Potential for OSPO++ to OSPO++ Cooperation
item.description: OSPO++ Policy, Governments & Agencies Working Group OSPO++ was honored to host a very special global event on Institutionalizing Open Source and building new cooperation infrastructure.

item.title: All the Boats Must Rise
item.description: In 20+ years of helping all sorts of organizations and people understand and participate in Open Source, the most difficult concept for learners is what I call the “All Boats Must Rise” concept.
